sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades (CDC) recomiendan que los empleados que tengan síntomas de enfermedades respiratorias agudas se queden en sus casas hasta que dejen de tener fiebre, signos de fiebre y cualquier otro síntoma durante, por lo menos, 24 horas sin haber tomado medicamentos para aliviar los síntomas o disminuir la fiebre; que las políticas de licencias por enfermedad sean flexibles y autoricen a los empleados a quedarse en casa para cuidar a un familiar enfermo, y que los empleados conozcan estas políticas.
en-mt: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness stay home until they are free of fever, signs of fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without taking medication to relieve symptoms or reduce fever; that sick leave policies are flexible and allow employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Según la OSHA, los trabajos con riesgo de exposición media incluyen aquellos que requieren contacto frecuente o cercano a menos de seis pies (1,8 m) con personas que no se sepa ni se sospeche que tengan COVID-19, pero que podrían haberse contagiado de SARS-CoV-2 debido a la transmisión comunitaria del momento alrededor de la ubicación de la empresa, o porque la persona hizo un viaje internacional recientemente a un lugar con transmisión generalizada de COVID-19.
en-mt: According to OSHA, jobs with medium exposure risk include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) with people not known or suspected to have COVID-19, but who may have been infected. of SARS-CoV-2 due to current community transmission around the business location, or because the person recently made international travel to a location with widespread transmission of COVID-19.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Estos incluyen a los trabajadores que están en contacto con el público general, como en las escuelas, los entornos de trabajo con mucha concentración de personas y algunos entornos de venta minorista de gran tamaño. Los controles de ingeniería para este grupo y los grupos de mayor riesgo incluyen la instalación de filtros de aire de alta eficiencia, el aumento de las tasas de ventilación, la instalación de barreras físicas como las cubiertas protectoras de plástico transparente y la colocación de una ventanilla para el servicio de atención para que el cliente pueda pedir desde el automóvil. Los controles administrativos para este grupo y los grupos de mayor riesgo incluyen recomendar a los trabajadores enfermos que se queden en casa, reemplazar las reuniones presenciales por comunicaciones virtuales, establecer turnos escalonados, suspender los viajes que no sean esenciales a los lugares con brotes vigentes de COVID-19, desarrollar planes de comunicaciones de emergencia que incluyan un foro para responder inquietudes de los trabajadores, ofrecer formación y capacitación actualizada a los trabajadores sobre los factores de riesgo y las conductas de prevención en relación con la COVID-19, capacitar a los trabajadores que tengan que usar indumentaria y equipos de protección sobre cómo usarlos, brindar recursos y un entorno de trabajo que promueva la higiene personal, exigir el lavado de manos frecuente, limitar el acceso de los clientes y el público al lugar de trabajo y colocar carteles sobre el lavado de manos y otras medidas de prevención de COVID-19. Según cuál sea la actividad laboral, es posible que los trabajadores que tengan riesgo de exposición media como mínimo deban usar equipos de protección individual, lo que incluye alguna combinación de guantes, un traje protector, una careta protectora o mascarilla, o gafas.
en-mt: These include workers who are in contact with the general public, such as in schools, crowded work environments, and some large retail settings. Engineering controls for this group and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic drop covers, and placing a window for customer service so that the customer can order from the car. Administrative controls for this group and higher-risk groups include advising sick workers to stay home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, suspending non-essential travel to locations with ongoing outbreaks of COVID-19, develop emergency communications plans that include a forum to respond to worker concerns, provide up-to-date education and training to workers on risk factors and prevention behaviors related to COVID-19, train workers workers who are required to wear protective clothing and equipment on how to use it, provide resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, require frequent hand washing, limit customer and public access to the workplace, and post signs on hand washing and other prevention measures for COVID-19. Depending on the work activity, workers with at least a medium exposure risk may be required to wear personal protective equipment, including some combination of gloves, a protective suit, a face shield or respirator, or goggles.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Los trabajadores de este grupo de riesgo rara vez deben usar respiradores.
en-mt: Workers in this risk group rarely need to use respirators.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Si una persona se enferma en un avión, los controles apropiados para proteger a los trabajadores y otros pasajeros incluyen separar a la persona enferma de los demás a una distancia de 6 pies, designar a un miembro de la tripulación para que atienda a la persona enferma y ofrecerle una mascarilla a la persona enferma o pedirle que se cubra la boca y la nariz con pañuelos de papel cuando tosa o estornude.
en-mt: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, appropriate controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by 6 feet, designating a crew member to care for the sick person and offer the sick person a mask or ask them to cover their mouth and nose with a tissue when they cough or sneeze.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: La tripulación de cabina debe usar guantes quirúrgicos desechables para atender a un pasajero enfermo o para tocar fluidos corporales o superficies posiblemente contaminadas y, quizás, equipos de protección individual si el pasajero enfermo tiene fiebre, tos persistente o dificultad para respirar.
en-mt: Cabin crew should wear disposable surgical gloves to care for a sick passenger or to touch possibly contaminated body fluids or surfaces, and perhaps personal protective equipment if the sick passenger has a fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Los guantes y demás artículos descartables deben desecharse en una bolsa para residuos biológicos peligrosos y las superficies contaminadas se deben limpiar y desinfectar posteriormente. En el caso de la navegación comercial, como los cruceros y otras embarcaciones que transporten pasajeros, los controles de riesgos incluyen postergar el viaje por enfermedad, el autoaislamiento e informar de inmediato al centro médico a bordo si alguien presenta fiebre u otros síntomas mientras esté a bordo.
en-mt: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazardous waste bag and contaminated surfaces cleaned and disinfected afterwards. For commercial shipping, such as cruise ships and other passenger-carrying vessels, risk controls include postponing travel due to illness, self-isolation, and promptly reporting to the onboard medical center if anyone develops a fever or other symptoms while aboard. board.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Lo ideal es que el control médico se haga en la cabina de la persona aislada. En el caso de las escuelas y los centros de cuidado infantil, los CDC recomiendan el cierre a corto plazo para limpiar o desinfectar si una persona infectada estuvo en el edificio escolar, independientemente de la transmisión comunitaria.
en-mt: Ideally, medical control should be done in the cabin of the isolated person. For schools and child care centers, the CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person was in the school building, regardless of community transmission.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Cuando la transmisión comunitaria es mínima o moderada, se pueden implementar estrategias de distanciamiento social, como cancelar las excursiones, las asambleas y otras reuniones masivas, como las clases de educación física o de coro o las comidas en el comedor, aumentar el espacio entre los pupitres, escalonar los horarios de entrada y salida, limitar las visitas que no sean esenciales y usar un lugar separado para la sala de salud para los niños que tengan síntomas gripales.
en-mt: When community transmission is minimal or moderate, social distancing strategies can be implemented, such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings, such as physical education or choir classes or meals in the cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, stagger check-in and check-out times, limit non-essential visitors, and use a separate location for the health room for children with flu-like symptoms.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Cuando hay una transmisión considerable en la comunidad local, además de las estrategias de distanciamiento social, se podrá considerar extender la cancelación de las clases. Para el personal de las fuerzas policiales que lleva a cabo actividades diarias de rutina, los CDC consideran que el riesgo inmediato para la salud es bajo.
en-mt: When there is significant transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, consideration may be given to extending the cancellation of classes. For law enforcement personnel carrying out routine daily activities, CDC considers the immediate health risk to be low.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Se recomienda a los oficiales de las fuerzas policiales que deban entrar en contacto con personas que tengan un diagnóstico confirmado o sospechas de COVID-19 que sigan las mismas pautas que los técnicos médicos de emergencias, incluido el uso de equipos de protección personal.
en-mt: Law enforcement officers who may come into contact with people with confirmed or suspected COVID-19 are advised to follow the same guidelines as EMTs, including the use of personal protective equipment.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: Si hay contacto cercano durante una detención, los trabajadores deberán limpiar y desinfectar su cinturón de trabajo y sus equipos con un aerosol o toallitas de limpieza de uso doméstico antes de volver a utilizarlos y seguir el procedimiento operativo estándar para la contención y el desecho del equipo de protección personal y la contención y el lavado de la ropa.
en-mt: If there is close contact during a stoppage, workers should clean and disinfect their work belt and equipment with a household cleaning spray or wipes before reuse and follow standard operating procedure for containment and disposal of equipment of personal protection and the containment and washing of clothes.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: La OSHA considera que ciertos trabajadores de la salud y de las morgues están dentro de categorías de alto o muy alto riesgo de exposición.
en-mt: OSHA considers certain health care and morgue workers to fall into high or very high risk exposure categories.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Entre los trabajos de alto riesgo de exposición, se encuentran los de los trabajadores de entregas, soporte, laboratorio y transporte médico que están expuestos a pacientes con diagnósticos confirmados o sospechas de COVID-19.
en-mt: High exposure risk jobs include delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to patients with confirmed or suspected COVID-19 diagnoses.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Estos se convierten en trabajos de muy alto riesgo de exposición si los trabajadores realizan procedimientos de generación de aerosoles en pacientes con diagnósticos confirmados o sospechas de COVID-19 o si toman o manipulan muestras de estos pacientes.
en-mt: These become very high exposure risk jobs if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on patients with confirmed or suspected COVID-19 diagnoses or if they collect or handle samples from these patients.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Algunos procedimientos de generación de aerosoles son la intubación, los procedimientos de inducción de tos, las broncoscopias, algunos procedimientos y exámenes dentales o la toma invasiva de muestras.
en-mt: Some aerosol generating procedures are intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and examinations, or invasive sampling.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Los trabajos de morgue de alto riesgo de exposición incluyen aquellos en los que los trabajadores están involucrados en la preparación de los cadáveres de personas que tenían COVID-19 o que se sospechaba que pudieran tenerla al momento de la muerte; estos pasan a tener un muy alto riesgo de exposición si realizan autopsias. Los controles de ingeniería adicionales para esos grupos de riesgo incluyen salas de aislamiento para pacientes con diagnóstico confirmado o sospechas de COVID-19, incluso cuando se les realizan procedimientos de generación de aerosoles.
en-mt: High-exposure-risk morgue jobs include those in which workers are involved in preparing the bodies of people who had or were suspected of having COVID-19 at the time of death; these become a very high risk of exposure if they perform autopsies. Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with confirmed or suspected COVID-19, including when performing aerosol-generating procedures.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: La ventilación especializada con presión negativa puede ser adecuada en algunos entornos de atención médica y morgues.
en-mt: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be adequate in some healthcare settings and morgues.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Las muestras se deben manipular tomando precauciones de Nivel de Bioseguridad 3.
en-mt: Samples must be handled taking Biosafety Level 3 precautions.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: La Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) recomienda que los pacientes que ingresan se separen en distintas salas de espera en función de si se sospecha o no que puedan tener COVID-19. Además de otros tipos de equipos de protección personal, la OSHA recomienda el uso de mascarillas para aquellas personas que trabajen a una distancia de hasta 6 pies de los pacientes que se hayan contagiado o se sospeche que se han contagiado de SARS-CoV-2 y para aquellos que realicen procedimientos de generación de aerosoles.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into different waiting rooms based on whether or not they are suspected of having COVID-19. In addition to other types of personal protective equipment, OSHA recommends the use of facemasks for those who work within 6 feet of patients with or suspected of having SARS-CoV-2 and for those performing aerosol generating procedures.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: En los Estados Unidos, se deben usar respiradores N95 con mascarilla de filtrado aprobados por NIOSH o superiores en el contexto de un programa respiratorio integral escrito que incluya pruebas de ajuste, capacitaciones y exámenes médicos.
en-mt: In the United States, NIOSH-approved or higher filtering facepiece N95 respirators must be used in the context of a comprehensive written respiratory program that includes fit testing, training, and medical examinations.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Otros tipos de mascarillas pueden brindar una mayor protección y mejorar la comodidad del trabajador. La OMS no recomienda el uso de monos protectores, ya que la COVID-19 es una enfermedad respiratoria, no una que se transmita por los fluidos corporales.
en-mt: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort. The WHO does not recommend the use of protective overalls, since COVID-19 is a respiratory disease, not one that is transmitted by bodily fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: La OMS solo recomienda el uso de una mascarilla quirúrgica para el personal de clasificación de pacientes que ingresan.
en-mt: The WHO only recommends the use of a surgical mask for staff triaging incoming patients.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Para aquellos que tomen muestras respiratorias de pacientes con COVID-19, les brinden atención o los transporten sin realizar procedimientos de generación de aerosoles, la OMS recomienda el uso de mascarilla quirúrgica, gafas o protector facial, bata y guantes.
en-mt: For those taking respiratory samples from patients with COVID-19, providing care or transporting them without performing aerosol generating procedures, the WHO recommends the use of a surgical mask, goggles or face shield, gown and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Si se realiza un procedimiento de generación de aerosoles, la mascarilla quirúrgica se debe reemplazar por un respirador N95 o FFP2.
en-mt: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask should be replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Debido a que el suministro de equipos de protección personal es insuficiente, la OMS recomienda minimizar la necesidad de usarlos, reemplazándolos por la telemedicina, las barreras físicas tales como ventanas transparentes, la limitación del permiso de ingreso a la habitación de un paciente con COVID-19 solo a aquellas personas involucradas en su atención directa, el uso de una misma mascarilla sin retirarla mientras se brinda atención a varios pacientes con el mismo diagnóstico, el monitoreo y la coordinación de la cadena de suministro de equipos de protección personal y desalentar el uso de mascarillas por parte de personas asintomáticas.
en-mt: Because the supply of personal protective equipment is insufficient, the WHO recommends minimizing the need to use it, replacing it with telemedicine, physical barriers such as transparent windows, limiting permission to enter the room of a patient with COVID-19 19 only to those people involved in their direct care, the use of the same mask without removing it while providing care to several patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordination of the supply chain of personal protective equipment and discouraging the use of masks by asymptomatic people.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: DE: Katherine Maher, CEO de Wikimedia Foundation
en-mt: FROM: Katherine Maher, CEO of the Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: Para: todo el personal de Wikimedia Foundation
en-mt: To: All Wikimedia Foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: ASUNTO: [Covid-19] Aligerar la carga y prepararnos para el futuro
en-mt: SUBJECT: [Covid-19] Lighten the load and prepare for the future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: FECHA/HORA DE ENVÍO: 14 de marzo de 2020, 00:24 h, tiempo universal coordinado
en-mt: SUBMISSION DATE/TIME: March 14, 2020, 00:24 Coordinated Universal Time

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: LICENCIA: CC0: Sin derechos reservados
en-mt: LICENSE: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Este mes, nos encontramos en circunstancias singulares.
en-mt: This month, we find ourselves in unique circumstances.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: La epidemia de la COVID-19 pone en evidencia nuestra interconexión humana a nivel global y las responsabilidades que tenemos el uno con el otro.
en-mt: The COVID-19 epidemic highlights our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Los desafíos que presenta no tienen precedentes, pero sabemos que nuestra mejor respuesta radica en la empatía, la cooperación y la construcción comunitaria global que conforman el núcleo de esta organización.
en-mt: The challenges it presents are unprecedented, but we know our best response lies in the empathy, cooperation, and global community building that are at the core of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: La camaradería y la preocupación que hemos visto entre todos nuestros compañeros en los mensajes de correo electrónico, las llamadas y las conversaciones es una gran validación de cuán increíbles son las personas con las que tenemos la suerte de trabajar.
en-mt: The camaraderie and concern we've seen among all of our colleagues in the emails, calls, and conversations is great validation of just how amazing the people we're lucky enough to work with are.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: No podría sentir mayor agradecimiento y orgullo de que todos ustedes sean mis compañeros.
en-mt: I couldn't feel more grateful and proud that all of you are my teammates.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: La semana pasada, alguien compartió conmigo el aprecio que sentía por nuestro trabajo.
en-mt: Last week someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Me recordaron cuán importante es para el mundo poder acudir a Wikipedia en este momento y el poderoso símbolo que es el hecho de que este recurso crítico permanezca en línea y disponible para todos.
en-mt: They reminded me how important Wikipedia is for the world right now and what a powerful symbol it is that this critical resource remains online and available to everyone.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Su trabajo hace que esto sea posible, ya sea al mantener los sitios en funcionamiento, ayudar a que nuestros compañeros reciban su pago o mantener a salvo nuestras comunidades.
en-mt: Your work makes this possible, whether it's keeping sites running, helping our colleagues get paid, or keeping our communities safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: El mundo necesita la información que Wikipedia proporciona, hoy más que nunca.
en-mt: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, today more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Este es un momento en el que no solo lo que hacemos sino la forma en que lo hacemos tendrán un profundo efecto en el mundo.
en-mt: This is a time when not only what we do but how we do it will have a profound effect on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Debido a la importancia de esta misión y a su papel en esta, a partir de esta próxima semana, haremos algunos ajustes importantes a la forma en que trabajamos juntos.
en-mt: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, starting this coming week, we will be making some important adjustments to the way we work together.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Ajustes a nuestro trabajo y nuestros cronogramas
en-mt: Adjustments to our work and schedules

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Como mencionó anteriormente Robyn, el equipo C se reunió anoche para hablar sobre nuestro enfoque y nuestro cronograma para los próximos días y meses.
en-mt: As Robyn mentioned earlier, the C-Team met last night to discuss our approach and timeline for the days and months ahead.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: En esa conversación, consideramos cuál creíamos que sería una respuesta adecuada a lo que estamos enfrentando y cuál sería la mejor manera de mantener la sostenibilidad de la organización en este momento.
en-mt: In that conversation, we considered what we believed would be an appropriate response to what we are facing and how best to maintain the sustainability of the organization at this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: En mayor medida, queríamos era eliminar el estrés y respaldar nuestra misión a largo plazo.
en-mt: More than anything, we wanted to de-stress and support our long-term mission.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Si necesita reducir la velocidad, está bien.
en-mt: If you need to slow down, that's fine.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Para todo el personal, los contratistas y los trabajadores con contrato:
en-mt: For all staff, contractors and contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: nuestras expectativas de trabajo diario serán de alrededor de 4 horas al día o 20 horas a la semana, hasta próximo aviso.
en-mt: our daily work expectations will be around 4 hours a day or 20 hours a week, until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: No estamos declarando un feriado; si puede trabajar en un horario más normal, esto sería de gran utilidad para la misión.
en-mt: We are not declaring a holiday; if you can work more normal hours, this would be very helpful to the mission.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Sin embargo, el mundo es un lugar impredecible actualmente, y ya sea que tenga que cuidar a sus seres queridos, hacer compras o ir al médico, nuestra prioridad es su bienestar.
en-mt: However, the world is an unpredictable place these days, and whether you need to care for loved ones, shop or go to the doctor, our priority is your well-being.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: No estamos llevando la cuenta de sus horas.
en-mt: We are not keeping track of your hours.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Si está enfermo, no trabaje.
en-mt: If you are sick, do not work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Aunque no debería hacer falta decirlo, nosotros lo decimos.
en-mt: Although it should go without saying, we say it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: No es necesario pedir licencia por enfermedad ni tiempo libre remunerado; solo informe a su gerente y ayude a su equipo a revisar los calendarios y cronogramas para asegurarse de que estén cubiertas las áreas clave del trabajo.
en-mt: You do not need to take sick leave or paid time off; Just let your manager know and help your team review calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Si recibe un diagnóstico positivo de COVID-19, avísele a Bryan, de Operaciones de T&C, para que T&C pueda ayudar con el soporte y asegurarse de que la gerencia esté al tanto de su situación).
en-mt: (If you receive a positive diagnosis of COVID-19, please notify Bryan in T&C Operations so T&C can help with support and ensure management is aware of your situation.)

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: La gente que trabaje por hora recibirá el pago total.
en-mt: People who work hourly will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Como hemos dicho, renovamos nuestro compromiso con nuestros contratistas y compañeros de personal que trabajan por hora.
en-mt: As we have said, we renew our commitment to our hourly contractors and fellow staff.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: A todos se les pagará sobre la base de sus horas normales trabajadas en circunstancias normales.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid based on their normal hours worked under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Esto se aplica también si está enfermo y no puede trabajar.
en-mt: This also applies if you are sick and cannot work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Si quiere trabajar, tiene nuestro apoyo.
en-mt: If you want to work, you have our support.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Muchas personas usan el trabajo como una forma de canalizar su estrés con el mundo que nos rodea.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to channel their stress into the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Lo que hagamos puede ser increíblemente gratificante, especialmente en estos tiempos.
en-mt: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially in these times.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Nuevamente, se trata de su cuidado personal.
en-mt: Again, it is about your personal care.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Lo que les pedimos es que se comuniquen con su gerente para que sepamos qué esperar y podamos adaptarnos correctamente.
en-mt: What we ask is that you contact your manager so that we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Ciertos trabajo se considera esencial.
en-mt: Certain work is considered essential.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Hay algunas cosas que debemos seguir haciendo.
en-mt: There are some things we must continue to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Los equipos de Ingeniería de Confiabilidad de Sitios, Operaciones de Recursos Humanos, Confianza y Seguridad y Recaudación de Fondos, entre otros, desempeñan una labor crítica que podría requerir apoyo adicional.
en-mt: The Site Reliability Engineering, HR Operations, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams, among others, perform critical work that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Comenzaremos un proceso con todos los departamentos para evaluar los objetivos actuales y modificar nuestro enfoque a fin de respaldar aquello que sea esencial para nuestra misión.
en-mt: We will begin a process with all departments to assess current goals and modify our approach to support what is essential to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Hay suficientes tareas para todos nosotros; la única diferencia es que nos concentraremos todos en los proyectos más esenciales.
en-mt: There are enough tasks for all of us; the only difference is that we will all concentrate on the most essential projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Reducir la velocidad hoy no nos dañará mañana.
en-mt: Slowing down today won't hurt us tomorrow.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: No planeamos "duplicar las horas para ponernos al día" cuando termine la pandemia.
en-mt: We do not plan to “double catch-up hours” when the pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: No se esperará que trabaje horas extras para cumplir con plazos que ya no son realistas.
en-mt: You will not be expected to work overtime to meet deadlines that are no longer realistic.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Aceptamos que las circunstancias han cambiado y trabajaremos para establecer nuevos objetivos y plazos cuando sea adecuado.
en-mt: We accept that circumstances have changed and will work to set new goals and deadlines where appropriate.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: ¿Qué sucede con la APP, o Planificación Anual?
en-mt: What about the APP, or Annual Planning?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Para ajustarnos a nuestra nueva realidad y expectativas de horas laborales diarias, planeamos ajustar el cronograma para la entrega de nuestra Planificación Anual de 2020-2021.
en-mt: To adjust to our new reality and expectations of daily business hours, we plan to adjust the schedule for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Planning.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Nuestra intención es proponer una extensión de nuestro plan de 2019-2020 que asigne más tiempo al presupuesto a fin de que los empleados puedan priorizar el trabajo crítico, el cuidado personal y el cuidado de los seres queridos mientras nos adaptamos a las necesidades de quienes necesitan o desean trabajar con un horario reducido durante las próximas semanas.
en-mt: Our intent is to propose an extension to our 2019-2020 plan that allocates more time in the budget so employees can prioritize critical work, self-care, and caring for loved ones while we accommodate the needs of those in need. or want to work reduced hours for the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Esta extensión de nuestro cronograma reduce en gran medida las cargas actuales de planificación y la presión en toda la organización.
en-mt: This extension of our schedule greatly reduces the current planning burdens and pressure on the entire organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Presentaremos nuestra propuesta ante el Consejo la semana que viene y les comunicaremos los próximos pasos a los delegados y a los equipos apenas tengamos una confirmación.
en-mt: We will present our proposal to Council next week and will communicate the next steps to delegates and teams as soon as we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Gracias al equipo de APP por su liderazgo en esta situación.
en-mt: Thanks to the APP team for their leadership in this situation.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Estado, exposición y limpieza de la oficina
en-mt: Condition, exposure and cleanliness of the office

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: La semana pasada nos enteramos de que uno de nuestros compañeros de la oficina de San Francisco podría haber estado expuesto al virus de la COVID-19.
en-mt: We learned last week that one of our colleagues in the San Francisco office may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Sin embargo, como medida de precaución, contratamos un equipo de limpieza antivírica para que desinfectara todas las superficies de la oficina de San Francisco.
en-mt: However, as a precaution, we hired an anti-viral cleaning team to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Usaron una solución antivírica de uso hospitalario para desinfectar todas las superficies, además de la recepción y los ascensores que van a nuestro piso.
en-mt: They used a hospital-grade antiviral solution to disinfect all surfaces, as well as reception and the elevators that go to our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: El edificio ha adoptado su propio protocolo de deber de cuidado, usando productos que respaldan la seguridad de sus ocupantes.
en-mt: The building has adopted its own duty of care protocol, using products that support the safety of its occupants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Nos sentimos confiados de que la oficina estará bien preparada para cuando decidamos volver.
en-mt: We feel confident that the office will be well prepared when we decide to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Nuestra oficina en DC se encuentra en un WeWork, que ha compartido su protocolo para COVID-19 con nosotros y todos los miembros del personal en las oficinas de DC.
en-mt: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all staff members in DC offices.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Desde la semana pasada, nuestra oficina de DC trasladó sus operaciones a un entorno completamente remoto de conformidad con las pautas compartidas con San Francisco.
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office moved its operations to a fully remote environment in accordance with guidelines shared with San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Como ya saben algunos de nuestros compañeros de la ciudad de Nueva York, también hemos hablado sobre alquilar un lugar en Brooklyn.
en-mt: As some of our colleagues in New York City already know, we've also talked about renting a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Estas discusiones siguen en curso pero es posible que se demoren.
en-mt: These discussions are still ongoing but may take time.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Algunos de nuestros compañeros trabajan de manera remota por primera vez.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Nuestros compañeros que ya trabajaban en forma remota desde antes saben que esta modalidad requiere una adaptación, por lo que brindan las siguientes sugerencias:
en-mt: Our colleagues who have already worked remotely before know that this modality requires an adaptation, so they offer the following suggestions:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Limite la duración de las reuniones a intervalos de una o dos horas como máximo.
en-mt: Limit the duration of the meetings to intervals of one or two hours maximum.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Si se requieren sesiones más prolongadas, considere la manera de seccionarlas en el transcurso de varios días.
en-mt: If longer sessions are required, consider spreading them out over several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Defina claramente la reunión con una lista de temas y envíe los materiales de lectura con anticipación.
en-mt: Clearly define the meeting with a list of topics and send reading materials ahead of time.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Adopte el uso del video de manera predeterminada, usando herramientas como Google Docs y Zoom para facilitar la colaboración y la conexión en vivo.
en-mt: Embrace video by default, using tools like Google Docs and Zoom to make it easy to collaborate and connect live.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Designe un líder para que modere cada reunión, una persona que controle las preguntas en el chat y la lista de oradores, y alguien que ayude a tomar notas (o tomen notas de manera colaborativa).
en-mt: Designate a leader to moderate each meeting, a person to control questions in chat and the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or take notes collaboratively).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Envíe un mensaje de correo electrónico a soporte técnico si necesita unos auriculares cómodos.
en-mt: Email support if you need a comfortable headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Use el reembolso de bienestar para refrigerios.
en-mt: Use the wellness reimbursement for snacks.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Únase al canal #remoties en Slack para hablar con sus compañeros sobre el trabajo distribuido
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel on Slack to talk to your colleagues about distributed work

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: El equipo de Operaciones de RR. HH. está analizando las pautas sobre ergonomía basada en seminarios web para apoyar el aumento del trabajo distribuido en toda la Fundación.
en-mt: The HR Operations team H H. is reviewing webinar-based ergonomics guidelines to support increased distributed work across the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Esta última semana les pedimos a todos los beneficiarios de subvenciones comunitarias que cancelaran los eventos públicos financiados por Wikimedia, como las editatones, hasta que la OMS declare el fin de la pandemia.
en-mt: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares an end to the pandemic.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Les informamos que entendíamos que nuestro pedido de cancelaciones y otras restricciones podría imposibilitar el cumplimiento de su parte de las actividades acordadas para la subvención y que no habría ninguna sanción por tener que demorar o modificar esos objetivos.
en-mt: We are letting you know that we understand that our request for cancellations and other restrictions may make it impossible for you to meet your agreed upon grant activities and that there would be no penalty for having to delay or change those goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Esta próxima semana haremos un seguimiento con pautas adicionales en Wikimania y otras conferencias temáticas comunitarias y regionales.
en-mt: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidelines at Wikimania and other community and regional topical conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: El sentimiento general de la comunidad a nivel global parece ser, en parte, tristeza por la interrupción y, en parte, alivio por la claridad y la capacidad de enfocarse en sus propias comunidades, tanto la de Wikimedia como otras.
en-mt: The general sentiment of the community globally seems to be part sadness at the disruption and part relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, both Wikimedia and others.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: En adelante, CRT estará trabajando para establecer una página en Meta-Wiki a fin de brindarle un espacio a la comunidad para monitorear el impacto y seguir nuestras comunicaciones con ellos.
en-mt: Going forward, CRT will be working to establish a Meta-Wiki page to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Mantener el contacto en relación con los asuntos de COVID-19
en-mt: Maintaining contact regarding COVID-19 matters

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Les enviaremos una invitación a través de sus calendarios para el próximo jueves, 14:00 h, tiempo universal coordinado/07:00 h, hora del Pacífico, para una reunión especial del personal.
en-mt: We will send you an invitation through your calendars for next Thursday, 2:00 PM Coordinated Universal Time/07:00 AM Pacific Time, for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Aprovecharemos esta oportunidad para compartir novedades adicionales, responder a sus preguntas y pasar tiempo conectándonos los unos con los otros.
en-mt: We'll take this opportunity to share additional news, answer your questions, and spend time connecting with one another.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Estamos juntos en esto y estamos disponibles para ayudar de la manera en que podamos.
en-mt: We are in this together and we are available to help in any way we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Mientras tanto, puede seguir encontrando la información de este mensaje de correo electrónico y toda la información esencial adicional relacionada con COVID-19 en Office Wiki.
en-mt: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information in this email and all other essential information related to COVID-19 on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT mantendrá estas páginas actualizadas y toda la información en un solo lugar.
en-mt: CRT will keep these pages up to date and all information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: También estamos trabajando para mantener comunicaciones regulares con el personal que reside en países que se están viendo afectados en gran medida actualmente.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain regular communication with staff residing in countries that are currently heavily affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre viajes, eventos, un flujo de trabajo importante, algún problema de cobertura o cualquier cosa con la que pueda necesitar ayuda, no dude en notificar a CRT y trabajar con ellos.
en-mt: If you have any questions about travel, events, important workflow, coverage issues, or anything you may need help with, feel free to notify CRT and work with them.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Estamos aquí para ayudar a brindar soporte y funcionar como enlace cuando sea necesario.
en-mt: We are here to help provide support and act as a liaison when needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Si tienen asuntos confidenciales o delicados, envíen un mensaje de correo electrónico a Bryan Judan, director de Operaciones Globales Internacionales de RR. HH.
en-mt: If you have confidential or sensitive issues, please email Bryan Judan, HR Director of Global International Operations. H H.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Ninguno de estos cambios se debe considerar un abandono de nuestro trabajo y nuestras obligaciones.
en-mt: None of these changes should be considered an abandonment of our work and our obligations.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: En lugar de esto, son un reconocimiento de que, en este momento, nuestro trabajo y nuestras obligaciones probablemente se deban adaptar de una manera que no había ocurrido antes.
en-mt: Instead, they are an acknowledgment that, at this time, our work and obligations may need to adapt in ways that have not occurred before.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Estas son las medidas que creemos necesarias para apoyarnos mutuamente a fin de poder continuar trabajando, darle a nuestro movimiento el apoyo necesario y brindarle al mundo el servicio en el que confía.
en-mt: These are the steps we believe necessary to support each other so that we can continue to work, give our movement the support it needs, and provide the world with the service it trusts.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Nuestro trabajo planificado seguirá allí para nosotros cuando llegue el momento.
en-mt: Our planned work will still be there for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Por ahora, es momento de apoyarnos mutuamente y hacer lugar para el trabajo importante que vendrá en las próximas semanas y, posiblemente, en los próximos meses.
en-mt: For now, it's time to support each other and make room for the important work to come in the coming weeks and possibly months to come.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Necesitamos de todos ustedes para que esto sea posible y, por eso, necesitamos que se cuiden y que cuiden a sus familias para que puedan encontrarse en el mejor estado posible cuando surja la necesidad.
en-mt: We need all of you to make this possible, and so we need you to take care of yourself and your families so they can be in the best possible state when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Ahora, por favor, ¡lávese las manos y no se toque el rostro!
en-mt: Now please wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M y Tony S) y el resto del equipo de Liderazgo (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M y Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S) and the rest of the Leadership team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V , Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: La enzima convertidora de la angiotensina 2 (ECA2) es una enzima que se adhiere a la superficie externa (membranas celulares) de las células de los pulmones, las arterias, el corazón, los riñones y los intestinos.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme that attaches to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: La ECA2 contrarresta la actividad de la enzima convertidora de la angiotensina (ECA) relacionada reduciendo la cantidad de angiotensina II y aumentando la angiotensina (1-7), lo que la convierte en una diana terapéutica para el tratamiento de enfermedades cardiovasculares. La ECA2 también sirve como punto de entrada a las células para algunos coronavirus.
en-mt: ACE2 counteracts the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) activity by reducing the amount of angiotensin II and increasing angiotensin (1-7), making it a therapeutic target for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 also serves as a cell entry point for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: La versión humana de la enzima generalmente se denomina hECA2.
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme is generally referred to as hECA2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: La enzima convertidora de la angiotensina 2 es una metaloenzima que contiene zinc y se encuentra en la superficie de las células endoteliales y de otros tipos.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme found on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: La proteína ECA2 contiene un dominio N-terminal de peptidasa M2 y un dominio C-terminal transportador renal de aminoácidos de colectrina.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal M2 peptidase domain and a C-terminal cholectrin amino acid renal transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: La ECA2 es una proteína de membrana unipaso de tipo I, con su dominio enzimáticamente activo expuesto en la superficie de las células de los pulmones y otros tejidos.
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I single-pass membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in the lungs and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: El dominio extracelular de la ECA2 es escindido del dominio transmembranal por otra enzima conocida como shedasa y, como resultado, la proteína soluble se libera en el torrente sanguíneo y, en última instancia, se excreta por la orina.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as shedase, and as a result, the soluble protein is released into the bloodstream and ultimately excreted in the urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: La ECA2 está presente en la mayoría de los órganos: la ECA2 está adherida, principalmente, a la membrana celular de las células alveolares tipo II de los pulmones, a los enterocitos del intestino delgado, a las células arteriales y endoteliales venosas y a las células arteriales del músculo liso de la mayoría de los órganos.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is mainly attached to the cell membrane of type II alveolar cells of the lungs, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells, and arterial cells. smooth muscle of most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: La expresión de mARN de la ECA2 también se encuentra en la corteza cerebral, el cuerpo estriado, el hipotálamo y el tronco encefálico.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: La función principal de la ECA2 es contrarrestar la ECA.
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to counteract ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: La ECA escinde la hormona de la angiotensina I y forma la angiotensina II, que es vasoconstrictora.
en-mt: ACE cleaves the angiotensin I hormone to form angiotensin II, which is vasoconstrictive.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: A su vez, la ECA2 escinde el aminoácido carboxilo-terminal fenilalanina de la angiotensina II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) y lo hidroliza para formar la angiotensina vasodilatadora (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: In turn, ACE2 cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine of angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyzes it to form the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H -Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: La ECA2 también puede escindir varios otros péptidos, entre los que se incluyen la [des-Arg9]-bradiquinina, la apelina, la neurotensina, la dinorfina A y la grelina.
en-mt: ACE2 can also cleave several other peptides, including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: La ECA2 también regula el tráfico de membranas del transportador de aminoácidos neutros SLC6A19 y se ha asociado con la enfermedad de Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been associated with Hartnup disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Como proteína transmembranal, la ECA2 sirve como punto principal de entrada para algunos coronavirus, incluidos el HCoV-NL63; el SARS-CoV (el virus que causa el SARS); y el SARS-CoV-2 (el virus que causa la COVID-19).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as a major entry point for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Más específicamente, la unión de la proteína espiga S1 del SARS-CoV y del SARS-CoV2 con el dominio enzimático de la ECA2 en la superficie de las células tiene como resultado la endocitosis y el traslado del virus junto con la enzima a los endosomas que se encuentran dentro de las células.
en-mt: More specifically, the binding of the S1 spike protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the ACE2 enzyme domain on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and movement of the virus along with the enzyme into endosomes that They are inside cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Este proceso de entrada también requiere la preparación de la proteína S por parte de la serina proteasa TMPRSS2 del huésped, la inhibición de la cual se está investigando actualmente como posible terapia. Esto ha conducido a ciertas hipótesis de que la reducción de los niveles de ECA2 en las células podría ayudar a combatir la infección.
en-mt: This entry process also requires preparation of protein S by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, inhibition of which is currently being investigated as a possible therapy. This has led to some hypotheses that lowering ACE2 levels in cells could help fight infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Sin embargo, diversas asociaciones profesionales y entes reguladores han recomendado continuar la terapia inhibidora de ECA y BRA estándar .
en-mt: However, various professional associations and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ARB and ACE inhibitor therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Una revisión con metaanálisis sistemático publicada el 11 de julio de 2012 determinó que "el uso de inhibidores de la ECA se asoció con una reducción significativa del 34 % del riesgo de neumonía en comparación con los casos de control".
en-mt: A systematic meta-analysis review published on July 11, 2012 found that "the use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared with case controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Además, "el riesgo de neumonía también se redujo en los pacientes que recibieron tratamiento con inhibidores de la ECA y que tenían un mayor riesgo de neumonía, en particular, aquellos con accidente cerebrovascular e insuficiencia cardíaca.
en-mt: In addition, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients receiving ACE inhibitor therapy who were at increased risk of pneumonia, particularly those with stroke and heart failure.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: El uso de los inhibidores de la ECA también se asoció con una reducción de la mortalidad relacionada con neumonía, aunque los resultados no fueron tan sólidos para el riesgo general de neumonía".
en-mt: The use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia-related mortality, although the results were not as robust for overall pneumonia risk."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: La ECA2 humana recombinante (rhECA2) parece ser una nueva terapia para la lesión pulmonar aguda y parece mejorar la hemodinámica pulmonar y la saturación de oxígeno en los lechones con síndrome de dificultad respiratoria aguda inducida por lipopolisacáridos.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhECA2) appears to be a new therapy for acute lung injury and appears to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: La vida media de la rhECA2 en los seres humanos es de aproximadamente 10 horas y el inicio de la acción es de 30 minutos además del transcurso del efecto (duración) de 24 horas.
en-mt: The half-life of rhECA2 in humans is approximately 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the 24-hour time of effect (duration).

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Varios hallazgos sugieren que la rhECA2 podría ser un medicamento prometedor para aquellas personas con intolerancia a los inhibidores clásicos del sistema renina-angiotensina (inhibidores del SRA) o en las enfermedades en las que se encuentra elevada la angiotensina II circulante. Se evaluó la infusión de rhECA2 en ensayos clínicos para el tratamiento del síndrome de dificultad respiratoria aguda.
en-mt: Several findings suggest that rhECA2 could be a promising drug for people with intolerance to classical inhibitors of the renin-angiotensin system (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases in which circulating angiotensin II is elevated. rhECA2 infusion was evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Las aplicaciones de la COVID-19 son aplicaciones de software para dispositivos móviles diseñadas para ayudar con el rastreo de contactos en respuesta a la pandemia de coronavirus de 2019-2020, es decir, el proceso de identificar a las personas ("contactos") que podrían haber estado en contacto con una persona contagiada.
en-mt: COVID-19 Apps are software applications for mobile devices designed to assist with contact tracing in response to the 2019-2020 coronavirus pandemic, i.e., the process of identifying individuals ("Contacts") who they could have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Se desarrollaron o se propusieron diversas aplicaciones con el respaldo oficial del gobierno en algunos territorios y jurisdicciones.
en-mt: Various applications were developed or proposed with official government endorsement in some territories and jurisdictions.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Se han desarrollado varios marcos para la creación de aplicaciones de rastreo de contactos.
en-mt: Various frameworks have been developed for building contact tracing applications.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Se han planteado inquietudes relacionadas con la privacidad, en particular, en relación con los sistemas que se basan en el rastreo de la ubicación geográfica de los usuarios de la aplicación.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, particularly in relation to systems that rely on tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Hay otras alternativas menos invasivas, como el uso de las señales de Bluetooth para registrar la proximidad de un usuario a otros teléfonos celulares.
en-mt: There are other, less intrusive alternatives, such as using Bluetooth signals to register a user's proximity to other cell phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: El 10 de abril de 2020, Apple y Google anunciaron en forma conjunta que integrarían la funcionalidad para admitir dichas aplicaciones basadas en Bluetooth directamente en sus sistemas operativos iOS y Android.
